settings.title: A Unique Style You Won't Find At The Resort
settings.text:
Our women’s {{ product.metafields.custom.mountain.value }} cropped hoodie is the perfect fusion of trend-forward design and laid-back ease. Made with a high-quality blend of 50% airlume combed and ring-spun cotton and 50% poly fleece, this hoodie is as soft and cozy as it is stylish. Its cropped cut and raw hem make it a modern essential that’s perfect for casual outings, workouts, or simply relaxing in style.

The lightweight yet warm fabric ensures you stay comfortable in all seasons, while the dropped shoulder design adds a relaxed, oversized fit for an effortlessly cool look. The dyed-to-match drawstrings add a subtle, polished touch, creating a seamless aesthetic that complements any outfit. Whether you’re pairing it with high-waisted jeans, leggings, or joggers, this hoodie is your new go-to for an effortlessly chic vibe.
